***Información Electoral Proximo***
**Election Day - May 2, 2026**

The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2026, the Council seats for District 3, District 4, and District 6 will be on the ballot.

The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2025, the Council seats for District 3, District 4, and District 6 will be on the ballot.

***Información Electoral Pasado***

**Election Day: May 3, 2025**
-----------------------------------------------------------------

### The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2025, the Council seats for Mayor , District 1, District 2, and District 5 will be on the ballot.

### **Información Electoral** **Election Day - May 4, 2024**

### The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2024, the Council seats for District 3, District 4, and District 6 will be on the ballot. **[Internet Posting Requirements for Political Subdivisions](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/doc-09_29_23-16_05_10.pdf?t=202309291707000) [Notice of Deadline to File an Application for Place on the Ballot - 2024](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20of%20Deadline%20to%20file%20for%20place%20on%20ballot%20%20%202024.pdf?t=202312151759400) [Aviso De Fecha Limite Para Presentar Una Solicitud Para Un Lugar En La Boleta - 2024](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20of%20Deadline%20to%20file%20for%20place%20on%20ballot%20%20%202024.pdf?t=202312151759400) [Order of Election - May 4, 2024](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Election.pdf?t=202402011632410) [Orden De Eleccion Para Municipios](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Election.pdf?t=202402011632410) [Notice of Election - May 4, 2024](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20of%20Election.pdf?t=202402011633260) [Aviso De Eleccion General](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20of%20Election.pdf?t=202402011633260) [Order of Cancellation - May 4, 2024](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Cancellation%20-%202024.pdf?t=202403201834230) [Ejemplo De Orden De Cancelacion - Mayo 4, 2024](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Cancellation%20-%202024.pdf?t=202403201834230)**

**Información Electoral**
**Election Day - May 6, 2023**

**Día de elección  de mayo, 2023**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2023, the Council seats for Mayor , District 1, District 2, and District 5 will be on the ballot. **[Notice of Drawing for Place on the Ballot  -  2023](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/doc-02_20_23-14_53_04.pdf?t=202302201556520) [Order of Election - May 6, 2023](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Election.pdf?t=202402011632410) [Notice Of General Election - May 6, 2023](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Notice%20of%20Election.pdf?t=202402011633260) [Order of Cancellation - 2023](https://www.coloradocitytexas.org/Order%20of%20Cancellation.pdf?t=202303241942360)**

### The City of Colorado City Council is composed of a Mayor, elected at large, and six (6) Council positions, elected from six geographically defined single member districts each serve two (2) year terms and are elected by the qualified votes of the City.  In 2022, the Council seats for District 3, District 4, and District 6 will be on the ballot.
